original_text: And he made his grave with the wicked, and with the rich in his death; because he had done no violence, neither was any deceit in his mouth.
korean_text: 그는 강포를 행하지 아니하였고 그의 입에 거짓이 없었으나 그의 무덤이 악인들과 함께 있었으며 그가 죽은 후에 부자와 함께 있었도다

sentences.original_text: And he made his grave with the wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 악인들과 함께 자기 무덤을 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: and with the rich in his death
because he had done no violence
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 어떤 폭력도 행하지 아니했으며

sentences.original_text: neither was any deceit in his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그 입에 어떤 거짓도 없었기 때문이라
